languages.text: "Такие клятвы может дать любой припертый к стенке еретик, лишь бы спасти свою жизнь".
"That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."
languages.original_text: "Такие клятвы может дать любой припертый к стенке еретик, лишь бы спасти свою жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "This is what any cornered heretic would swear to save their life."
"This is what any cornered heretic would swear to save their life."
"That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."
"That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."
"That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."
"That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

languages.text: 「それは、追い詰められた異端者なら誰だって、自分の命を救おうとして誓う言葉です」
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: 「それは、追い詰められた異端者なら誰だって、自分の命を救おうとして誓う言葉です」

languages.text: "Köşeye sıkışan her kâfir de canını kurtarmak pahasına böyle yeminler eder."
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: "Köşeye sıkışan her kâfir de canını kurtarmak pahasına böyle yeminler eder."

languages.text: «Eso es lo que juraría cualquier hereje acorralado para intentar salvar su vida».
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es lo que juraría cualquier hereje acorralado para intentar salvar su vida».

languages.text: “每个走投无路的异端分子为了保命，都会像这样赌咒发誓。”
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: “每个走投无路的异端分子为了保命，都会像这样赌咒发誓。”

languages.text: « C'est précisément ce que n'importe quel hérétique acculé prétendrait pour sauver sa vie. »
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: « C'est précisément ce que n'importe quel hérétique acculé prétendrait pour sauver sa vie. »

languages.text: "Das würde jeder in die Ecke getriebene Ketzer schwören, um sein Leben zu retten."
languages.original_text: "That is what any cornered heretic would swear to try to save their life."

traits.locale_text: "Das würde jeder in die Ecke getriebene Ketzer schwören, um sein Leben zu retten."
